pr_title: DG-820: Fix telemetry reporter handling of leadership changes

timeline.bodyText: nit, any reason we don't want to keep the existing setLeader method and have isLeaderNode.set(leader ? 1 : 0); set as part of this method?
timeline.author: xvrl

replies.bodyText: I modified it to be similar to all other metric getters in the file. This one was special because it had that leader change logic, but now it's not anymore.
replies.author: dragosvictor
